steps.title: A structured integration process to activate the framework in your TradingView environment within minutes.

steps.items.title: Step 1: Select Access Tier
steps.items.description: Choose the access plan that aligns with your operational trading horizon.

steps.items.title: Step 2: Provide TradingView Username
steps.items.description: Enter your exact TradingView username during checkout to link the private script to your account.

steps.items.title: Step 3: Secure Payment Processing
steps.items.description: Finalize your subscription securely via our Stripe-integrated payment gateway.

steps.items.title: Step 4: Automatic Authorization
steps.items.description: After successful payment, your TradingView account is automatically authorized, granting immediate access to the invite-only system.

steps.items.title: Step 5: Initialize on Chart
steps.items.description: Open TradingView, navigate to your 'Invite-only scripts' folder, and apply the framework to your chart.

steps.items.title: Step 6: Configure Automation (Optional)
steps.items.description: Connect the framework to your exchange via webhooks for fully automated, rule-based trading. View the Automation Guide.
